mapper.insert: insert into user_t(emp_id, password, status, name, gender_id, dep_id, pos_id) values(#{empId}, #{pw}, 1, #{name}, #{genderId}, #{dept.code}, #{pos.code})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_T SET STATUS = 0 WHERE EMP_ID = #{EMPID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPARTMENT_T(CODE, NAME, PARENT, DEP_LEVEL) VALUES(#{code}, #{name}, #{parent.code}, #{level})
INSERT INTO COMMON_CODE_T(CODE_VAL, CODE_NAME, CODE_GUBUN) VALUES(#{code}, #{name}, #{catCode})
mapper.select: SELECT U.EMP_ID as EMP_ID, U.NAME as NAME, U.GENDER_ID as GENDER_ID, D.CODE as DEPT_CODE, D.NAME as DEPT_NAME, D.DEP_LEVEL as DEPT_LEVEL, P.CODE_NAME as COMM_NAME , P.CODE_VAL as COMM_CODE, M.CODE_GUBUN_NAME as CAT_NAME, M.CODE_GUBUN as CAT_CODE, U.JOIN_DT as JOIN_DT, U.LEAVE_DT as LEAVE_DT FROM USER_T U LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT_T D ON U.DEP_ID = D.CODE LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE_T P ON U.POS_ID = P.CODE_VAL LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE_M_T M ON P.CODE_GUBUN = M.CODE_GUBUN
SELECT CODE, NAME, DEP_LEVEL FROM DEPARTMENT_T
